mdRecord.dcterms:description: This is a program for the service celebrating the 151st Church Anniversary at the First Baptist Church in Lexington, Virginia on September 22-23, 2018. It includes profiles of two of the officiants Reverend F. Todd Gray and , a message from Reverend McKinley Anthony Williams, Pastor; and information about a revival. The Fall Revival on September 24-26 featured the Guest Revivalist, The Reverend Doctor Carl L. Washington, Jr., Pastor at New Mount Zion Baptist Church of NYC.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Celebrating the 151st Church Anniversary at the First Baptist Church, September 22, 2018
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: First Baptist Church (Lexington, Va.)
Church anniversaries
